title: Amazon Alexa is now available on the latest Wear OS smartwatches from Fossil and Skagen
content:
The launch of the Skagen Falster Gen 6 earlier this year brought with it the reveal of a partnership between Amazon and Fossil that would bring Alexa to select Wear OS smartwatches. Now, a few months later, that feature is finally going live.

moreâ€¦

The post Amazon Alexa is now available on the latest Wear OS smartwatches from Fossil and Skagen appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Amazon Alexa is now officially available on Google's Wear OS, but it only works on select products from Fossil and Skagen for the time being.
